casebody.data:
Robert MELLET and Betty Evans, on behalf of themselves and other persons similarly situated, Plaintiffs-Petitioners,
v.
AQUASID, LLC, t/a Future Fitness Powered by AFC, Defendant-Respondent. C-175 September Term 2017
079739 Supreme Court of New Jersey. October 16, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004438-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
